views.markdown:
Fix click for non-portrait orientations especially on iPad Pro. Fix accessing complete screen when SpringBoard starts in landscape mode.
Only depend on RocketBootstrap for iOS 7+.

Dependency fix for older firmwares.

Update for iOS 9 Unlock on click for iOS 6+
Made mouse pointer show on iOS 8 lock screen
iOS 8 ready
Update for iOS 7. Support for ControlCenter activation. Fix Lef/t/Right Button Swap
More toggles for BTC Mouse & Trackpad
- pointer above CallBar
- fix orientation in apps that get rotated by SBRotator
- fix cloaking (don't click on the mouse pointer) for iOS 6
- forward all clicks during app switcher active to Springboard
Use hid-support for touch simulation.
Fixes problems with touches on AppSwitcher in IOS 6 and similar issues

Detect orientation changes on iOS 6+
Don't hide mouse pointer when disconnecting one of several clients (e.g. BTC Mouse & Trackpad + Veency) New settings for BTC Mouse & Trackpad:
* 'Disable Scrollwheel' setting
* 'Two finger touch' on right click per app
* Realigned button mapping for Veency again
* Fix clocks on lockscreen for iOS 6 r208-2
Ignore older "swap buttons 2 & 3" settings

r207-2
* Fixed broken touch simulation on iPad 3/5.1.1 for some cases

r206-42
* Retina mouse pointer
* New settings icon
* Turtle and hare icons instead of speed value
* Mouse pointer above App Switcher
* Support for BTC Mouse & Trackpad
* Compatible with iOS 6

    svn.r205
  • * fix touch simulation for iOS 5

    svn.r204
  • * Fix click on alerts on Retina devices. Thanks to qwertyoruiop for explaining the bug
    svn.r203
  • Fix click simulation inside apps on 4.2+
  • Align mouse pointer with actual click point in non-portrait orientation
    svn.r201-8
  • iPad: allow clicking in lower (y>= 768) area of screen
    v svn.r200
  • Made 4.2.1 compatible
  • Auto-unlock and un-dim on movement instead of preventing auto-lock
    svn.r115
  • FIX: On iPad, mouse clicks now work in all apps (not just SpringBoard).
    svn.r110
  • Fixed iPad support.
